Subject: Pro X pedals set
I bought a Pro X pedal set a while back and in my box for the kit I never received the Heel plate with the base plate. I got the base plate, just no heel plate. I ordered my set through Amazon and the set I ordered I thought was with the base plate and heel plate. Do you sell a Pro X version with only the base plate and no heel plate?
